medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The pain started abruptly at 2:30 AM and is constant, worsening, occasionally radiating to the left chest. The patient reports two prior episodes of similar pain associated with nausea and vomiting.
medical_history.past_medical_history: 2 episodes of prior epigastric pain; underwent EGD which showed normal mucosa with irregular Z-line in the GE junction. Prescribed omeprazole for epigastric pain.
